channel.title: [PI] Muting [PI]
channel.description:
heyyy ive got a problem with my Mute and Ipmute
if i do ::mute or ::ipmute the players get on the mute list but still can talk how to fix this?

because your mute list isnâ€™t connected to anything. You need to go through and change the talking case and say if player is on the muted list then cantalk is false. and just surround the whole case or most of it in an if statement.
